mapper.select: select count(*) from articleView where viewer=#{viewer} and writer=#{writer} and regdate=#{regdate} and boardType=#{boardType}
mapper.update: update articleView set viewdate=now() where viewer=#{viewer} and writer=#{writer} and regdate=#{regdate} and boardType=#{boardType}
mapper.insert: insert into articleView(viewer, writer, regdate, boardType) values(#{viewer},#{writer},#{regdate}, #{boardType})
